couldNotBeFetched.description: Report message when a resource can't be fetched

description.message: Warns against using the BOM (byte-order marker) character at the beginning of a text based file

errorRequesting.description: Debug information when a resource can't be fetched

textBased.description: Report message when a text-based resource start with BOM character
textBased.message: Text-based resource should not start with BOM character.

validating.description: Debug informatino to show when the validation starts
